ai-tha-ap64:1.2_0: While walking mindfully in the open,
ai-tha-ap64:2.4_0: like a canopy in the sky,
ai-tha-ap64:3.1_0: Through that deed and its result,
ai-tha-ap64:3.4_0: having left victory and defeat behind.
ai-tha-ap64:4.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap64:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap64:4.4_0: this carpet is full of fruit.
ai-tha-ap64:5.1_0: I’m twenty years old, twenty, thirty,
ai-tha-ap64:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Power.
ai-tha-ap64:8.1_0: Second the Lord of the World
